planInfo.planType: Lean Gains - Fat Loss Introduction (Partial Month)

nutritionGoals.primary: Begin fat loss journey while supporting twice-daily training
secondary: Establish consistent eating schedule around workouts
Support morning strength training and afternoon cardio
Create sustainable eating habits for summer
Maintain energy levels throughout increased training volume
specificTargets: Establish high protein intake for muscle preservation
Learn optimal meal timing around twice-daily workouts
Set foundation for July's full month plan

calories.notes: Moderate deficit for sustainable start to fat loss

fats.timing: Away from immediate pre/post workout periods

meal1.name: Early Breakfast
suggestions: Oatmeal with protein powder and banana
Greek yogurt with berries and granola
Whole grain toast with almond butter and banana

meal2.name: Pre-Morning Workout Snack
suggestions: Banana with 1 tsp honey
Rice cake with jam
Apple slices with tiny bit of peanut butter

meal3.name: Post-Morning Workout
meal3.purpose: Muscle recovery and preparation for afternoon
suggestions: Protein shake with banana and oats
Chocolate milk with protein powder
Greek yogurt with protein powder and berries

meal4.name: Lunch
suggestions: Grilled chicken breast with quinoa and vegetables
Salmon with sweet potato and broccoli
Lean ground turkey with brown rice and mixed vegetables

meal5.name: Pre-Afternoon Cardio
meal5.purpose: Energy for cardio without stomach discomfort
suggestions: Small banana
Handful of dates (2-3)
Rice cake with thin layer almond butter

meal6.name: Post-Workout Dinner
suggestions: Grilled fish with roasted vegetables and quinoa
Chicken stir-fry with brown rice and oil
Lean beef with sweet potato and green vegetables

meal7.name: Evening Snack
suggestions: Casein protein with almond butter
Greek yogurt with nuts
Cottage cheese with a few berries

weekendAdjustments.saturday: Same structure but can be more flexible with timing
weekendAdjustments.sunday: More relaxed timing, focus on meal prep for upcoming week

daily.name: Whey Protein Powder
daily.purpose: Muscle recovery and hitting protein targets

daily.name: Creatine Monohydrate
daily.purpose: Strength and power for morning workouts

tasks: Cook protein sources for 3-4 days (chicken, fish)
Wash and cut vegetables for easy access

june23to30.notes: Focus on consistency over perfection, learn what works
priorities: Track how foods affect energy levels
Note hunger patterns with new schedule

nutritionGuidelines: Time carbs around workouts for energy
Stay consistently hydrated - critical with twice daily training
Track everything for the first week to establish patterns
Listen to your body - adjust portions if energy is low
Plan meals ahead to avoid poor choices when busy
Focus on nutrient density during the deficit

troubleshooting.notHungryForMeal: Have smaller portion but keep protein
troubleshooting.weekendOvereating: Plan social meals, focus on protein choices
